name: CreateUserApplicationKey
description:
Create an application key for the current user in Datadog.

Use this tool to generate a new application key for the current Datadog user. This is useful for accessing Datadog APIs that require authentication with user-specific credentials.

parameters.name: application_key_name
parameters.description: The name of the application key to be created for the current user.

parameters.name: application_key_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type, should always be 'application_keys'.

parameters.name: application_key_scopes
parameters.description: List of scopes to grant the application key for accessing specific resources.

value_schema.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.scopes
parameters.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key.

value_schema.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key.
